column5: Like I suspect many others, I have been buying a few things for this season. Here's a few pictures of my new gear.                And last but not least.    Good Luck on the upcoming season.  Best wishes: Rick

Nice gear Rick. I have been looking at a small ice hut by Frabill and another by Clam...that might be my big winter purchase for this year...aside from that just some line, hooks, and bells I've bought
The "Lindy Slick Jig" is awesome!!  Randy
ok ummmm, there's a couple things else i think you might want to get. a fishing rod,and GWB's phone number so he can drill the holes for you..... cause we know he's dying to try out his new auger
Oh I got the poles. About 10 of them. Tip-ups also. Too many lures & gaining. As for Now that could be handy. Save me drilling my own.
Very nice, Rick but where's the aquaview and beer fridge?
Nice start for sure! Glad to see I'm not the only one dieing to get out on the ice
Some great selections there Rick !! Too bad the classified adverts disappear automatically... I have that same one man HT hut here!
Glad to see that someone else has the hardwater fever and is gearing up.  GR
